New Records: Equatorial Guinea scored nine goals in the group stages, the most of any side in the tournament
Key Match Events: Equatorial Guinea has reached the knockout stage in each of their last four AFCON appearances
Pre-Game Insights: Equatorial Guinea has a better form record compared to Guinea heading into the match
Emilio Nsue scored five goals, the oldest to do so in an AFCON
Jose Machin became one of only three players to provide an assist in three consecutive AFCON matches
Miscellaneous Highlights: This is the first meeting between Equatorial Guinea and Guinea despite being close in FIFA rankings
Guinea has a poor record in knockout stages, not scoring in four previous matches
